wiki.content: Fergie told The Daily Mail that for this song, “ I transported myself back to 1985", when I was 11 and saw Madonna in concert for the first time on the Virgin tour. I took on her persona in that song as a homage.” (Source Meet Me Halfway Songfacts). 'Meet Me Halfway' is the 'peas third consecutive No.1 smash, following on from chart-toppers 'I Gotta Feeling' and 'Boom Boom Pow'. The track hit the top spot in the UK chart in November 2009. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Fergie told The Daily Mail that for this song, “ I transported myself back to 1985", when I was 11 and saw Madonna in concert for the first time on the Virgin tour. I took on her persona in that song as a homage.” (Source Meet Me Halfway Songfacts). 'Meet Me Halfway' is the 'peas third consecutive No.1 smash, following on from chart-toppers 'I Gotta Feeling' and 'Boom Boom Pow'. The track hit the top spot in the UK chart in November 2009.
